control.label: Forced view for movies inside set: $INFO[Skin.String(SkinHelper.ForcedViews.setmovies)]

control.visible: StringCompare(Container.Viewmode,WIDE) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartwidevideo) | StringCompare(Container.Viewmode,POSTER) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartpostervideo) | StringCompare(Container.Viewmode,LOW LIST) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartlowlistvideo) | StringCompare(Container.Viewmode,GLASS LIST) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartglasslistvideo) | StringCompare(Container.Viewmode,RIGHT LIST) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartrightlistvideo) | StringCompare(Container.Viewmode,SHOWART) | StringCompare(Container.Viewmode,PANEL) + Skin.HasSetting(noviewpanelposter) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows)] | StringCompare(Container.Viewmode,POSTER LIST) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartposterlistvideo) + Container.Content(movies)

control.label: $VAR[value_addon1_custom]
control.onclick: RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, mediatype=tvshow, dbid=$INFO[ListItem.DBID], poster, seasonposter, fanart, extrafanart, extrathumbs, clearlogo, clearart, tvthumb, seasonthumb, banner, seasonbanner, characterart)
RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, mediatype=movie, dbid=$INFO[ListItem.DBID], poster, fanart, extrafanart, extrathumbs, clearlogo, clearart, discart, thumb, banner)
RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, dbid=$INFO[ListItem.DBID], poster, fanart, extrafanart, extrathumbs, clearlogo, clearart, discart)

control.description: Group recording items by folder structure
